title: Xiao Xian Zhi Yao
synopsis:
He Wan, the leader of the Hidden Clan feared by all three realms, suddenly attacked the Heavenly Palace. The Supreme God Nan Ze came to fight. In order to protect Nan Ze, the jade-growing fairy Yu Zhiyao risked her life to save him. When she and He Wan were about to perish together, she was unexpectedly reborn. By mistake, Yu Zhiyao was reborn into He Wan's body. After the rebirth, He Wan's Hidden Power was greatly damaged. Ting Zhao, the Hidden Guard of the West Sea, came to help the leader He Wan recover her Hidden Power. Since then, Zhiyao was forced to embark on the road of a two-faced female leader, pretending to be majestic in front of others and being charming in front of the king...

(Source: Iqiyi, Google translated)
